translation.Fabricação e fornecimento de torres trel: Manufacture and supply of lattice towers, hot dip galvanized, with heights of up to 130 meters. Supply of all sensors as well as data acquisition systems
translation.Fornecimento de torres e sensores de med: Supply of measurement towers and sensors, as well as a data acquisition system.
translation.Montagem de torres treliçadas e autoport: Assembly of lattice and self-supporting towers; with experienced teams with more than 10 years in the market.
translation.Instrumentação de estações anemométricas: Instrumentation of complete anemometric and solarimetric stations, having its teams experience with all the most used dataloggers on the market
translation.Desenvolvimento de planos de manutenção,: Development of maintenance plans, as well as quality execution.
translation.Correção de falhas, seja do tipo estrutu: Correction of faults, whether structural or instrumental, with immediate assistance.
translation.Equipe treinada, com experiência em cert: Trained team, with experience in project certification and analysis of the behavior of the meteorological variables involved
translation.Certificação dos Dados Solarimétricos e: Certification of Solarimetric Data and Annual Energy Production
translation.Tratamento dos dados brutos e certificaç: Processing of raw data and annual certification of energy production, having already certified more than 6 GW in solar photovoltaic and wind energy projects.
translation.A Nótus Torres procura desenvolver suas: Nótus Torres seeks to develop its activities in accordance with the best market practices. Standard procedures have been developed for all services our teams will perform.
translation.aboutp1: Nótus Torres seeks to develop its activities in accordance with the best market practices. Standard procedures have been developed for all services that our teams will perform; These procedures govern the teams from the planning stage (this phase is where the steps and methods of execution are dimensioned), as well as the necessary follow-ups by our field coordinators.
translation.aboutp2: We have developed a methodology for preparing technical reports, managing to issue them within a period of up to 15 days after the execution of the service; which allows the Client to formally obtain the results of the execution of the services and improve its internal planning.
translation.aboutp3: We are developing a maintenance management tool, which should be presented to our Customers early next year. This tool will improve our internal flows, especially service execution plans, together with our Clients.
translation.aboutp4: Thus, our main objective is to provide the energy market with solutions that are reliable, using quality and safety as benchmarks.
translation.Certificação dos <span>Dados Solarimétri: Certification of Solarimetric Data and Annual Energy Production
